summary: Our recommendations to federal agencies help save money and improve government operations. We reported in 2018 that government-wide, 77% of recommendations we made 4 years ago have been implemented. However, DOD's implementation rate was only 67% in the same time period. We have also alerted DOD to our priority recommendations—those that can help it save the most money, address issues on our High Risk list...
title: Defense Management: Status of GAO Recommendations Made to the Department of Defense (Fiscal Years 2014-2017)
